scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:SEO_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration:
<propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Title}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="pageTitle" resourceName="PageTitle" dataType="string" descriptionResourceName="PageTitle_Description" defaultValue="" /> <property id="metaKeywords" resourceName="MetaKeywords" dataType="string" descriptionResourceName="MetaKeywords_Description" defaultValue="" /> <property id="metaDescription" resourceName="MetaDescription" dataType="string" defaultValue="" descriptionResourceName="MetaDescription_Description" controlType="Telligent.DynamicConfiguration.Controls.MultilineHtmlControl, Telligent.DynamicConfiguration" /> <property id="canonicalUrl" resourceName="CanonicalUrl" dataType="url" defaultValue="" descriptionResourceName="CanonicalUrl_Description" /> </propertyGroup> <propertyGroup id="openGraph" resourceName="OpenGraph"> <property id="openGraphTitle" resourceName="OpenGraphTitle" dataType="string" defaultValue="" descriptionResourceName="OpenGraphTitle_Description" /> <property id="openGraphDescription" resourceName="OpenGraphDescription" dataType="string" defaultValue="" descriptionResourceName="OpenGraphDescription_Description" controlType="Telligent.DynamicConfiguration.Controls.MultilineHtmlControl, Telligent.DynamicConfiguration"/> <property id="openGraphImage" dataType="url" defaultValue="" resourceName="OpenGraphImage" descriptionResourceName="OpenGraphImage_Description" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ThemeFileUrlControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.FileExtensionRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" validExtensions="gif,jpg,jpeg,png" /> </property>
</propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="CanonicalUrl">Canonical Url</resource> <resource name="CanonicalUrl_Description">If specified this will override the default url used in the canonical link tag. By default the canonical url is the page's current base url.</resource> <resource name="If specified this will override the default url used in the canonical link tag. By default the canonical url is the page's current base url."></resource> <resource name="MetaDescription">Meta Description</resource> <resource name="MetaDescription_Description">Should describe the page's content and will be placed in the description meta tag.</resource> <resource name="MetaKeywords">Meta Keywords</resource> <resource name="MetaKeywords_Description">A comma separated list of keywords that will be placed in the keywords meta tag.</resource> <resource name="OpenGraph">Open Graph</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphDescription">Description</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphDescription_Description">The description to be used in an Open Graph meta tag. If not specified no tag will be rendered.</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphImage">Image</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphImage_Description">An image to be used in the open graph meta tag. If not specified no tag will be rendered.</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphTitle">Title</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphTitle_Description">The title to be used in an Open Graph meta tag. If not specified no tag will be rendered.</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="PageTitle">Page Title</resource> <resource name="PageTitle_Description">The text to be used in the title tag of this page. If not specified the page name will be used.</resource> <resource name="SEO_Description">Provides SEO Meta Data For Custom Content Pages</resource> <resource name="SEO_Name">4 Roads - Page Custom MetaData</resource> <resource name="Title">4 Roads - Page Custom MetaData</resource> </language>
